work.name: Jobscan
work.summary: Team Lead for Jobscan's Engineering Team, leading projects and guiding team members as we work to help job seekers everywhere.

work.name: Jobscan
work.position: Technical Lead / Interim Head of Engineering
work.summary: Promoted to Technical Lead to lead small team of Engineers within Jobscan's Engineering Team.  When our CTO departed shortly after I was promited, I stepped in as Interim Head of Engineering leading the entire Engineering team and acting in a leadership capacity for all technical decisions made at Jobscan.

work.name: Sunnyvale Community Players
work.position: Board of Directors Member & Show Techniclal Staff
work.summary:
Experienced in many aspects of theatrical design and operations.  Served varied roles during the productions of over a dozen shows.  Such roles include: Producer, Audio Engineer, Sound Designer, and Special Effects Designer.

In 2018, became a member of Sunnyvale Community Players' Board of Directors, during his tenure there, he served multiple roles including Web Committee Chairman, Board Secretary, and Board Vice President.

✔	Served in the role of Producer four Live Theater Productions.
✔	Sound Designer for over half a dozen live musical productions Special Effects designer using custom self-designed IoT devices to provide special effects for shows.

work.name: Justia Inc.
work.summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer for Justia, I serve as web developer and network engineer. Participate as initial lead developer in release of several of Justia's Free Legal Information projects.  Manage and oversee groundwork for working with the AWS Cloud and configuring servers for a variety of projects and environments. 

✔	Designed and developed multiple user-friendly web applications, including Justia Dockets, Justia Lawyer Directory, and BlawgSearch.
✔	Represented Justia at conferences around the country.
✔	Wrote over 70 articles for the Justia Legal Marketing and Technology Blog.

work.name: Want a Better Website, Inc
work.summary: As a Web Programmer for Want a Better Website, Inc., I created dynamic web properties based on PHP for web design clients. Designed and developed interactive websites while ensuring high traffic, user experience, and page views. Supervised and led front-end development and provided assistance with back-end programming for website. Trained, coached, and mentored junior staff while ensuring best practice workmanship.

work.name: PortalKeeper Inc.
work.summary: Founder, I established and successfully ran the company while ensuring streamlining of all operations. Delivered network and IT consulting services for small businesses in DFW area and Ran Linux systems for advanced web hosting services.

work.name: Get on the Air, Inc.
work.summary: Spearheaded the Western Carolina Wireless project on a Rural Initiative grant from the state of North Carolina.  Designed long range wifi network with largest network hop of over 10 miles.  Also provided second level technical support to wireless internet clients.  Developed and maintained a public Internet resource center where citizens of Graham County, North Carolina could access high-speed internet at no charge.

work.name: Metrotime Business Systems
work.summary: Maintained Metrotime's office networking, designed and maintained Metrotime's Website, provided IT and networking consulting services to Metrotime's clients, installing and optimizing networks for businesses around the DFW Metroplex

work.name: 5GuysTech LLC
work.summary: Co-founded web hosting and web development company out of Poulsbo, WA.  Was responsible for maintaining linux servers and developing and maintaining websites, billing systems and database applications.
